attributes.action: Introduce free prescriptions for people with long-term mental health conditions
attributes.additional_details: Currently people with certain medical conditions can get free NHS prescriptions. These conditions include cancer, diabetes, and hyperthyroidism, and are typically continuing physical disabilities. Unfortunately, people diagnosed with long-term mental health conditions are not provided with the same support. Many people with long-term mental health conditions have co-existing conditions, meaning the number and cost of medications can be very expensive and unmanageable.
attributes.background: Introduce free prescriptions for people with diagnosed long-term mental health conditions, helping to close the current gap between mental and physical health conditions, and enabling access to mental health support for everyone.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend NHS Free prescription to those who have a mental health condition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618679

Free prescriptions for everyone with long-term or chronic health conditions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623701
